ability.name: Infernal Chains
ability.description: [Champion] smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.

ability.name: Spirit Rush
ability.description: [Champion] dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.

ability.name: Twilight Shroud
ability.description: [Champion] drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains Move Speed. While inside the shroud, [Champion] becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

Akshan.name: Akshan
Akshan.title: the Rogue Sentinel
Akshan.quote: "Fixing the world, one scoundrel at a time!"

ability.name: Avengerang
ability.description: [Champion] throws a boomerang that deals damage going out and coming back, extending its range each time it hits an enemy.

ability.name: Pulverize
ability.description: [Champion] smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.

ability.name: Public Execution
ability.description: [Champion] blinks to the farthest enemy champion in a line of her choosing and suppresses them upon her arrival. She then slams the enemy into the ground where they take damage and are stunned.

ability.name: Tantrum
ability.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage [Champion] would take. [Champion] can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time [Champion] is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced.

ability.name: Crystallize
ability.description: [Champion] condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.

Annie.name: Annie
Annie.title: the Dark Child
Annie.quote: "You wanna play too? It'll be fun!"

ability.name: Summon: Tibbers
ability.description: [Champion] wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.

ability.name: Weapon Queue System
ability.description: [Champion] has no third ability. This slot shows the next weapon Alune will give him. Weapon order begins fixed but may change over game time -- when a weapon is out of ammo it goes to the end of the order.

ability.name: Ranger's Focus
ability.description: [Champion] builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, [Champion] can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.

Aurelion Sol.name: Aurelion Sol
Aurelion Sol.title: The Star Forger
Aurelion Sol.quote: "In a constantly shifting cosmos, a world this static is... refreshing."

ability.name: Astral Flight
ability.description: [Champion] flies over terrain in a targeted direction. While in this state, he can cast other abilities. Breath of Light no longer has a cooldown or maximum channel duration and deals increased damage while flying.Astral Flight's remaining cooldown is reduced whenever an enemy champion dies after being recently damaged by [Champion].Stardust increases Astral Flight's maximum range.

ability.name: The Weirding
ability.description: [Champion] converges the realms, sending out a blast of spirit magic that damages and slows enemies before [Champion] hops backward to safety.

ability.name: Arise!
ability.description: [Champion] summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to [Champion] and his Sand Soldiers.

Bard.name: Bard
Bard.title: the Wandering Caretaker
Bard.quote: Bard lets a  Meep onto his shoulder and lets it run to and fro across his arms.

ability.name: Caretaker's Shrine
ability.description: Reveals a Health shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing and speeding up the first ally that touches it.

Bel'Veth.name: Bel'Veth
Bel'Veth.title: the Empress of the Void
Bel'Veth.quote: "I am the voice of the silence."

ability.name: Endless Banquet
ability.description: [Champion] consumes Void coral remnants, transforming into her true form and increasing her max health, attack range, attack speed, and out-of-combat move speed. Consuming the Void coral remnants of a Void epic monster will grant her a longer ultimate duration, as well as the power to summon Void remora.

ability.name: Power Fist
ability.description: [Champion] charges up their fist to make the next attack deal double damage and pop their target up in the air.

Brand.name: Brand
Brand.title: the Burning Vengeance
Brand.quote: "Ready to set the world on fire? Heheheh..."

ability.name: Pyroclasm
ability.description: [Champion] unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces up to 5 times off of [Champion] and nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.

ability.name: Stand Behind Me
ability.description: [Champion] leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, [Champion] and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.

Briar.name: Briar
Briar.title: the Restrained Hunger
Briar.quote: "Nice to meet you! I'm hungry. I mean... Briar!"

ability.name: Head Rush
ability.description: [Champion] leaps to a unit and hits enemies with The Heel Wheel (of Pain), stunning them and breaking their Armor.

Caitlyn.name: Caitlyn
Caitlyn.title: the Sheriff of Piltover
Caitlyn.quote: "Shall I turn in my badge and rifle as well?"

ability.name: Piltover Peacemaker
ability.description: [Champion] revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).

Camille.name: Camille
Camille.title: the Steel Shadow
Camille.quote: "Precision is the difference between a butcher and a surgeon."

ability.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
ability.description: [Champion] dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.

ability.name: Twin Fang
ability.description: [Champion] lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, [Champion] regains Mana.

Cho'Gath.name: Cho'Gath
Cho'Gath.title: the Terror of the Void
Cho'Gath.quote: "You'd wish the world you know to end! Yeeeesssss..."

ability.name: Vorpal Spikes
ability.description: [Champion]'s attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.

Corki.name: Corki
Corki.title: the Daring Bombardier
Corki.quote: "I'm up to snuff, and gots me an ace machine!"

ability.name: Valkyrie
ability.description: [Champion] flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.

ability.name: Noxian Guillotine
ability.description: [Champion] leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.

ability.name: Moonfall
ability.description: [Champion] reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and slows them.If [Champion] pulls in one or more enemy champions, the moonlight crashes down onto her after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area around her, increased for each target beyond the first pulled.

ability.name: Whirling Death
ability.description: [Champion] hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to [Champion] after striking an enemy champion. [Champion] may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction. Executes enemies who have less health than [Champion]'s number of Adoration stacks.

ability.name: Infected Bonesaw
ability.description: [Champion] throws an infected bonesaw, dealing damage to the first enemy hit based on their current health and slowing them.

Ekko.name: Ekko
Ekko.title: the Boy Who Shattered Time
Ekko.quote: "It's not how much time you have, it's how you use it."

ability.name: Parallel Convergence
ability.description: [Champion]'s basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to low health enemies. He can cast Parallel Convergence to split the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If [Champion] enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and stuns enemies by suspending them in time.

Elise.name: Elise
Elise.title: the Spider Queen
Elise.quote: "Only the spider is safe in her web."

ability.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
ability.description: Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

ability.name: Allure
ability.description: [Champion] curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.

ability.name: Mystic Shot
ability.description: [Champion] fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit.

Fiddlesticks.name: Fiddlesticks
Fiddlesticks.title: the Ancient Fear
Fiddlesticks.quote: A stripped-down version of Star Guardian 2022's orchestral theme plays.

ability.name: Bountiful Harvest
ability.description: [Champion] drains health from nearby enemies, dealing bonus execute damage at the end of the duration.

ability.name: Lunge
ability.description: [Champion] lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

ability.name: Seastone Trident
ability.description: [Champion]'s attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. [Champion] can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time.

ability.name: Winds of War
ability.description: [Champion] fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado that deals damage over time.

Gangplank.name: Gangplank
Gangplank.title: the Saltwater Scourge
Gangplank.quote: "Neither the flames nor the depths could claim me."

ability.name: Cannon Barrage
ability.description: [Champion] signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.

Garen.name: Garen
Garen.title: The Might of Demacia
Garen.quote: "My heart and sword always for Demacia."

ability.name: Courage
ability.description: [Champion] passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a shield and tenacity for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.

Gnar.name: Gnar
Gnar.title: the Missing Link
Gnar.quote: Gnar drops upside down and playfully flaunts the skull he carries around.

ability.name: GNAR!
ability.description: Mega [Champion] throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them.  Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.

ability.name: Body Slam
ability.description: [Champion] charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.

ability.name: End of the Line
ability.description: [Champion] fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.

ability.name: Needlework
ability.description: [Champion] hurls a needle that slows enemies hit, deals magic damage, and applies A Thousand Cuts to champions hit. This ability can be cast up to two more times, with each cast throwing additional needles and dealing more damage. [Champion] must hit an enemy between each cast to unlock the next one.

Hecarim.name: Hecarim
Hecarim.title: the Shadow of War
Hecarim.quote: "Behold, the might of the Shadow Isles."

ability.name: Devastating Charge
ability.description: [Champion] gains increasing Move Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.

ability.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
ability.description: [Champion] lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.

Hwei.name: Hwei
Hwei.title: the Visionary
Hwei.quote: "A painter meets their subject eye to eye."

ability.name: Subject: Serenity
ability.description: [Champion] envisions a series of serenities, allowing him to paint invigorating settings.This ability replaces [Champion]'s abilities with utility abilities: Fleeting Current, Pool of Reflection, and Stirring Lights.

Illaoi.name: Illaoi
Illaoi.title: the Kraken Priestess
Illaoi.quote: "I'm not big on sermonsâ€”broken bones teach better lessons."

ability.name: Test of Spirit
ability.description: [Champion] rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles.

ability.name: Defiant Dance
ability.description: [Champion] charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge.

ability.name: Daisy!
ability.description: [Champion] summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Re-cast command Daisy to attack or move.

ability.name: Howling Gale
ability.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, [Champion] is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.

Jarvan IV.name: Jarvan IV
Jarvan IV.title: the Exemplar of Demacia
Jarvan IV.quote: "By my will, this shall be finished."

ability.name: Golden Aegis
ability.description: [Champion] calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.

Jax.name: Jax
Jax.title: Grandmaster at Arms
Jax.quote: Jax yawns. "Looks like I'll be carrying more than my own weight today."

ability.name: Leap Strike
ability.description: [Champion] leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.

ability.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
ability.description: Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.

Jhin.name: Jhin
Jhin.title: the Virtuoso
Jhin.quote: "In carnage, I bloom, like a flower in the dawn."

ability.name: Dancing Grenade
ability.description: [Champion] launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.

Jinx.name: Jinx
Jinx.title: the Loose Cannon
Jinx.quote: "Rules are made to be broken... like buildings! Or people!"

ability.name: Zap!
ability.description: [Champion] uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.

Kai'Sa.name: Kai'Sa
Kai'Sa.title: Daughter of the Void
Kai'Sa.quote: "Are you the hunter... or the prey?"

ability.name: Killer Instinct
ability.description: [Champion] dashes near an enemy champion.

ability.name: Fate's Call
ability.description: [Champion] teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.

ability.name: Inner Flame
ability.description: [Champion] sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

Karthus.name: Karthus
Karthus.title: the Deathsinger
Karthus.quote: "Agony, ecstasy, peace. Every passing has a beauty all its own."

ability.name: Requiem
ability.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, [Champion] deals damage to all enemy champions.

Kassadin.name: Kassadin
Kassadin.title: the Void Walker
Kassadin.quote: "The balance of power must be preserved."

ability.name: Nether Blade
ability.description: Passive: [Champion]'s basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: [Champion]'s next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.

ability.name: Shunpo
ability.description: [Champion] blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.

ability.name: Radiant Blast
ability.description: [Champion] conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.

ability.name: Umbral Trespass
ability.description: [Champion] hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.

ability.name: Thundering Shuriken
ability.description: [Champion] throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

ability.name: Taste Their Fear
ability.description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. [Champion] also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.

ability.name: Dance of Arrows
ability.description: [Champion] tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.

Kled.name: Kled
Kled.title: the Cantankerous Cavalier
Kled.quote: "I find courage unpredictable. It's total insanity you can rely on!"

ability.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
ability.description: [Champion] and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.

ability.name: Caustic Spittle
ability.description: [Champion] launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. [Champion] also gains additional attack speed.

K'Sante.name: K'Sante
K'Sante.title: the Pride of Nazumah
K'Sante.quote: "Better to fight, than to live in fear."

ability.name: All Out
ability.description: [Champion] knocks an enemy back, launching them through any wall in their path. Then, [Champion] goes All Out and dashes after them, gaining increased damage, healing, and transformed abilities at the cost of reduced defenses.

LeBlanc.name: LeBlanc
LeBlanc.title: the Deceiver
LeBlanc.quote: "The Black Rose shall bloom once more."

ability.name: Mimic
ability.description: [Champion] casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.

ability.name: Tempest / Cripple
ability.description: Tempest: [Champion] smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, [Champion] can cast cripple.Cripple: [Champion] cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Move Speed. Move Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

ability.name: Zenith Blade
ability.description: [Champion] projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and [Champion] will dash to them.

ability.name: Watch Out! Eep!
ability.description: [Champion] deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center.

Lissandra.name: Lissandra
Lissandra.title: the Ice Witch
Lissandra.quote: "I will bury the world in ice."

ability.name: Ice Shard
ability.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Move Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

Lucian.name: Lucian
Lucian.title: the Purifier
Lucian.quote: "Everybody dies. Some just need a little help."

ability.name: Piercing Light
ability.description: [Champion] shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

ability.name: Glitterlance
ability.description: Pix and [Champion] each fire a bolt of magical energy that damages and heavily slows all enemies it hits.

Lux.name: Lux
Lux.title: the Lady of Luminosity
Lux.quote: "But all my light puns would've brightened your day."

ability.name: Lucent Singularity
ability.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. [Champion] can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

Malphite.name: Malphite
Malphite.title: Shard of the Monolith
Malphite.quote: "I'm moving as fast as I can."

ability.name: Unstoppable Force
ability.description: [Champion] launches himself to a location at high speed, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.

ability.name: Void Swarm
ability.description: [Champion] summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.

ability.name: Bramble Smash
ability.description: [Champion] knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

ability.name: Meditate
ability.description: [Champion] rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, [Champion] will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

Milio.name: Milio
Milio.title: The Gentle Flame
Milio.quote: "Stick with me! I'll keep you warm." Fuemigo cheers.

ability.name: Breath of Life
ability.description: [Champion] unleashes a wave of soothing flames that heal and remove crowd control effects from allies in range.

ability.name: Bullet Time
ability.description: [Champion] channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike

ability.name: Warrior Trickster
ability.description: [Champion] becomes Invisible and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies.

ability.name: Realm of Death
ability.description: [Champion] drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.

Morgana.name: Morgana
Morgana.title: the Fallen
Morgana.quote: "I am bound, but I will not break."

ability.name: Black Shield
ability.description: [Champion] anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken.

Naafiri.name: Naafiri
Naafiri.title: the Hound of a Hundred Bites

ability.name: Eviscerate
ability.description: [Champion] dashes and damages enemies in an area around her, recalling her packmates and fully healing them.

Nami.name: Nami
Nami.title: the Tidecaller
Nami.quote: "I decide what the tide will bring."

ability.name: Aqua Prison
ability.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.

Nasus.name: Nasus
Nasus.title: the Curator of the Sands
Nasus.quote: "The cycle of life and death continues,we will live,they will die."

ability.name: Siphoning Strike
ability.description: [Champion] strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

ability.name: Dredge Line
ability.description: [Champion] hurls his anchor forward.  Colliding with an enemy pulls them and [Champion] together, dealing magic damage.  Colliding with terrain pulls [Champion] towards it.

ability.name: Pop Blossom
ability.description: After a short preparation, [Champion] leaps into the air. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and knocked up. The preparation is hidden if [Champion] is disguised.

ability.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
ability.description: [Champion] transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

ability.name: Formless Blade
ability.description: With a snap of her whip-blade, [Champion] damages any enemies she hits in a straight line in her chosen direction. This action extends her attack range for a short duration.

ability.name: Unspeakable Horror
ability.description: [Champion] plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and applying fear to the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.

ability.name: Snowball Barrage
ability.description: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.

ability.name: Ragnarok
ability.description: [Champion] passively gains increased armor and magic resist. He can activate this ability to become immune to disables for as long as he keeps attacking.

Orianna.name: Orianna
Orianna.title: the Lady of Clockwork
Orianna.quote: "We will kill your enemies. That will be fun."

ability.name: Command: Dissonance
ability.description: [Champion] commands her Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.

Ornn.name: Ornn
Ornn.title: The Fire below the Mountain
Ornn.quote: "I have fur. It is soft. Do not hug me."

ability.name: Volcanic Rupture
ability.description: [Champion] slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

ability.name: Comet Spear
ability.description: [Champion] either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.

Poppy.name: Poppy
Poppy.title: Keeper of the Hammer
Poppy.quote: "I'm no heroâ€”just a Yordle with a hammer."

ability.name: Keeper's Verdict
ability.description: [Champion] channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.

ability.name: Bone Skewer
ability.description: [Champion] either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.

ability.name: Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal
ability.description: [Champion] swings her weapon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on her element.

ability.name: Heightened Senses
ability.description: Passively grants [Champion] Attack Speed and Move Speed after she attacks a Vulnerable target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.

ability.name: Grand Entrance
ability.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.

Rammus.name: Rammus
Rammus.title: the Armordillo
Rammus.quote: The voice-over for  Durian Defender Rammus is not available as unique set of audio files (the audio is directly pitched in-game from the base voice-over by the audio engine).

ability.name: Soaring Slam
ability.description: [Champion] hops into the air and slams down at a target area, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If cast while [Champion] is in Powerball, [Champion] knocks up enemies near the center as well.

ability.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
ability.description: [Champion] bites her target, dealing bonus damage if she has max Fury.While Burrowed, [Champion] creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

Rell.name: Rell
Rell.title: the Iron Maiden
Rell.quote: "Nothing gets in, no one gets out."

ability.name: Full Tilt
ability.description: Passive: [Champion] gains out of combat Move Speed.Active: [Champion] and an ally gain ramping Move Speed, doubled toward enemies and each other. Her next Attack explodes, dealing magic damage.

Renata Glasc.name: Renata Glasc
Renata Glasc.title: the Chem-Baroness
Renata Glasc.quote: "It's 'Miss Glasc'... if you value your life."

ability.name: Handshake
ability.description: Renata sends out a missile rooting the first enemy hit, and can recast the ability to throw the unit in a direction.

ability.name: Cull the Meek
ability.description: [Champion] swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.

ability.name: Savagery
ability.description: [Champion]'s next Attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.

ability.name: Broken Wings
ability.description: [Champion] lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.

ability.name: Flamespitter
ability.description: [Champion] torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

ability.name: Rune Prison
ability.description: [Champion] traps a target in a cage of runes, damaging them and slowing their movement. If the target has Flux on it, they are instead rooted.

ability.name: Blade Whirl
ability.description: [Champion] slashes around her, damaging enemies and destroying enemy missiles.

ability.name: Permafrost
ability.description: [Champion] freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.

Senna.name: Senna
Senna.title: the Redeemer
Senna.quote: "No one fights alone in the Mist."

ability.name: Curse of the Black Mist
ability.description: [Champion] draws the Mist she has stored in her weapon into a storm around her, embracing darkness and becoming a wraith within. Allies who enter the area are camouflaged and also appear as wraiths as the Mist shrouds them. Wraiths gain increased Move Speed, are unselectable, and hide their identities.

ability.name: High Note
ability.description: [Champion] deals damage in an area.

Sett.name: Sett
Sett.title: the Boss
Sett.quote: "'Ey, never pick a fight you can't win."

ability.name: Knuckle Down
ability.description: [Champion]'s next two attacks deal additional damage based off of the target's max health. [Champion] also gains Move Speed while moving towards enemy champions.

ability.name: Deceive
ability.description: [Champion] becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and critically striking if he attacks from behind.

ability.name: Twilight Assault
ability.description: [Champion] recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from [Champion].

ability.name: Flame Breath
ability.description: [Champion] unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. [Champion]'s basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.

ability.name: Mega Adhesive
ability.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

ability.name: Decimating Smash
ability.description: [Champion] charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.

Sivir.name: Sivir
Sivir.title: the Battle Mistress
Sivir.quote: "I always take my toll; blood, or gold."

ability.name: Boomerang Blade
ability.description: [Champion] hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.

Skarner.name: Skarner
Skarner.title: the Primordial Sovereign
Skarner.quote: "I am the vanguard of Ixtal's protection."

ability.name: Ixtal's Impact
ability.description: [Champion] charges forward and passes through terrain. If he collides with a champion or large monster, he'll slam them into the next wall he hits to damage and stun them.

Smolder.name: Smolder
Smolder.title: the Fiery Fledgling
Smolder.quote: "I heard that the royal family of Camaroar used to offer rings to my ancestors. Ha, those things must've been humongous."

ability.name: Achooo!
ability.description: [Champion] lets out an adorable flaming sneeze that explodes when hitting enemy champions.

ability.name: Crescendo
ability.description: [Champion] plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of [Champion]'s basic abilities.

ability.name: Astral Infusion
ability.description: [Champion] sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

ability.name: Vision of Empire
ability.description: [Champion] opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant [Champion] a Soul Fragment.

ability.name: Chain Lash
ability.description: [Champion] lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies. After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage.

ability.name: Scatter the Weak
ability.description: [Champion] knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.

Tahm Kench.name: Tahm Kench
Tahm Kench.title: The River King
Tahm Kench.quote: "Call me king, call me demon. Water forgets the names of the drowned."

ability.name: Abyssal Dive
ability.description: Dive down and then re-appear at target location, damaging and knocking up all enemies in an area.

ability.name: Seismic Shove
ability.description: [Champion] causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within it in a direction of her choosing.

ability.name: Noxian Diplomacy
ability.description: [Champion] stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, [Champion] will leap at his target before stabbing them. [Champion] refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.

Taric.name: Taric
Taric.title: the Shield of Valoran
Taric.quote: "That glimmer of hope you see, that's me."

ability.name: Starlight's Touch
ability.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

ability.name: Toxic Shot
ability.description: Each of [Champion]'s attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Flay
ability.description: [Champion]'s attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, [Champion] sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

Tristana.name: Tristana
Tristana.title: the Yordle Gunner
Tristana.quote: "Once a Bandle gunner, always a Bandle gunner!"

ability.name: Rocket Jump
ability.description: [Champion] fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.

Trundle.name: Trundle
Trundle.title: the Troll King
Trundle.quote: "I'm troll judge, troll jury, and execu... troll!"

ability.name: Chomp
ability.description: [Champion] bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.

ability.name: Mocking Shout
ability.description: [Champion] lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to [Champion] also have their Move Speed reduced.

ability.name: Pick a Card
ability.description: [Champion] chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

Twitch.name: Twitch
Twitch.title: the Plague Rat
Twitch.quote: "What doesn't kill you just isn't finished yet."

ability.name: Venom Cask
ability.description: [Champion] hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

ability.name: Wilding Claw
ability.description: [Champion] gains attack speed and his next two attacks deal bonus physical damage. Recast: Gain even more attack speed, and the next two attacks call lightning to strike the target.

Urgot.name: Urgot
Urgot.title: the Dreadnought
Urgot.quote: "You cannot know strength... Until you are broken."

ability.name: Fear Beyond Death
ability.description: [Champion] fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, [Champion] judges them weak and can execute them.

ability.name: Piercing Arrow
ability.description: [Champion] readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

Vayne.name: Vayne
Vayne.title: the Night Hunter
Vayne.quote: "Let us hunt those who have fallen to darkness."

ability.name: Tumble
ability.description: [Champion] tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.

ability.name: Primordial Burst
ability.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

ability.name: Plasma Fission
ability.description: [Champion] shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.

ability.name: Looming Darkness
ability.description: Summon a damaging and slowing zone that applies Gloom to enemies.

ability.name: Cease and Desist
ability.description: [Champion] runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.

ability.name: Blade of the Ruined King
ability.description: [Champion]'s spectral blade passively deals bonus percent current Health damage On-Hit and strikes twice vs. enemies he recently hit with an Ability, stealing Health.[Champion] can activate this Ability to thrust his zweihander forward, impaling enemies in front of him.

ability.name: Siphon Power
ability.description: [Champion] blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack.Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and [Champion] gains bonus Move Speed after casting.

ability.name: Hemoplague
ability.description: [Champion] infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals [Champion] for each enemy Champion hit.

ability.name: Sky Splitter
ability.description: [Champion] summons a lightning bolt at a location, dealing damage and Slowing enemies while granting [Champion] a Shield if he's inside the blast radius.

ability.name: Primal Howl
ability.description: [Champion] gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

Xayah.name: Xayah
Xayah.title: the Rebel
Xayah.quote: "I can never resist an invitation to dance."

ability.name: Double Daggers
ability.description: [Champion] throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

ability.name: Rite of the Arcane
ability.description: [Champion] immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.

ability.name: Three Talon Strike
ability.description: [Champion]'s next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

Yasuo.name: Yasuo
Yasuo.title: the Unforgiven
Yasuo.quote: "Death is like the windâ€”always by my side."

ability.name: Sweeping Blade
ability.description: Dashes through target enemy, dealing magic damage. Each cast increases subsequent dash's damage, up to a max amount.Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for a few seconds.If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle.

ability.name: Spirit Cleave
ability.description: Cleaves forward, damaging all enemies in a cone. Grants a shield to [Champion], the value is increased by the number of champions hit by the swipe.Spirit Cleave's cooldown and cast time scale with attack speed.

Yorick.name: Yorick
Yorick.title: Shepherd of Souls
Yorick.quote: "Fear not... I will make use of your corpse."

ability.name: Dark Procession
ability.description: [Champion] summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

ability.name: Zoomies
ability.description: Shields [Champion] and boosts Move Speed and Attack Speed. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.

ability.name: Stretching Strikes
ability.description: [Champion] stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.

ability.name: Death Mark
ability.description: [Champion] becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage [Champion] dealt to the target while they were marked.

ability.name: Lightning Crash
ability.description: [Champion] discharges a nova of electricity and overcharges herself, gaining increased damage and stacking Move Speed that refreshes and gets stronger every time she hits an enemy champion. While overcharged, Burst fire becomes a faster triple shot that chains lightning between enemies.

ability.name: Bouncing Bomb
ability.description: [Champion] throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.

ability.name: Time Bomb
ability.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.

ability.name: Spell Thief
ability.description: [Champion] can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.

ability.name: Grasping Roots
ability.description: [Champion] sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Move Speed.
